name: Path of Rime
description: You can greatly speed plant growth.  Grass can grow from seed in moments, crops can shoot towards the sky, and even young trees can put forth mighty limbs.  You cannot, however, bring a plant to ripeness or fruiting.  The glamour is <color_yellow>slightly more costly</color> and <color_yellow>quicker to expire</color> in summer.
